channel.title: Posts on Kiera
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Kiera

item.title: Beware the Azure VM throttle
item.description: One of my customers went live with their datawarehouse solution in Azure a few weeks back. Everything went smoothly until the analysts hit the boxes with more than they could handle and we had to rearchitect a new solution on the fly.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello world this is my first post! I’ve written a couple of blogs for work and wanted to try out Hugo.
